_metadata.description: Bloatware removal configuration with system optimization settings

ms-copilot.name: TurnOffWindowsCopilot
ms-copilot.description: System-wide Copilot disable via Group Policy

skype-business-office.warning_message: Skype for Business is integrated with Office suite and cannot be removed independently
skype-business-office.guidance_message: To remove Skype for Business, use Office Deployment Tool or remove entire Office suite

Microsoft Office & Productivity.Name: Microsoft Office Hub
Microsoft Office & Productivity.Description: Office application launcher and trial promotions.

Microsoft Office & Productivity.Name: Microsoft Teams (Consumer)
Microsoft Office & Productivity.Description: Consumer version of Teams chat application.
Microsoft Office & Productivity.Warning: Note: This only removes consumer Teams. Business/Enterprise Teams installations are separate.

Microsoft Office & Productivity.Name: OneNote (Store)
Microsoft Office & Productivity.Description: Universal Windows Platform version of OneNote.
Microsoft Office & Productivity.Warning: Note: Removing will disable OneNote sync. Existing notes remain accessible via web or other devices.

Microsoft Office & Productivity.Name: Microsoft People
Microsoft Office & Productivity.Warning: Note: Contact sync with Microsoft services will be disabled. Contacts remain in individual apps.

Microsoft Office & Productivity.Name: Skype for Business (Office)
Microsoft Office & Productivity.Description: Skype for Business bundled with Microsoft Office suite.
Microsoft Office & Productivity.Warning: CRITICAL: Cannot be removed separately from Office suite. Requires Office Deployment Tool or complete Office removal.

Microsoft Office & Productivity.Name: New Outlook for Windows
Microsoft Office & Productivity.Description: Modern Outlook replacement for Mail and Calendar apps.
Microsoft Office & Productivity.Warning: CAUTION: This is replacing the legacy Mail and Calendar apps. Consider keeping if you use Outlook.

Microsoft Office & Productivity.Name: Microsoft Dev Home
Microsoft Office & Productivity.Description: Developer dashboard and tools for Windows development.

Windows Built-ins.Name: Mixed Reality Portal
Windows Built-ins.Description: VR and mixed reality setup portal.

Windows Built-ins.Name: Phone Link (Your Phone)
Windows Built-ins.Warning: Note: Removes Android phone integration features. Only affects users actively using phone sync.

Windows Built-ins.Name: Windows Camera
Windows Built-ins.Warning: CAUTION: Removing Camera will disable camera functionality system-wide and may break apps that require camera access.

Windows Built-ins.Name: Mail and Calendar
Windows Built-ins.Warning: Note: Removes default email/calendar apps. Email accounts remain accessible via web or other clients.

Windows Built-ins.Name: Windows Sound Recorder
Windows Built-ins.Warning: Note: This is Windows' built-in audio recorder. Consider alternatives like Audacity before removal.

Windows Built-ins.Name: ClipChamp
Windows Built-ins.Warning: CAUTION: This is the default video editor in Windows 11. Consider alternatives before removal.

Windows Built-ins.Name: Microsoft Media Player
Windows Built-ins.Description: Modern replacement for Windows Media Player Legacy.
Windows Built-ins.Warning: Note: Default media player for Windows 11. File associations may revert to legacy apps after removal.

Windows Built-ins.Name: Windows Alarms & Clock
Windows Built-ins.Warning: Note: Removes built-in alarms and timers. Phone or third-party apps provide alternatives.

Windows Built-ins.Name: Windows Maps
Windows Built-ins.Warning: Note: May affect some location features. Most location services remain functional.

Windows Built-ins.Name: Windows Feedback Hub
Windows Built-ins.Description: System feedback and bug reporting tool.

Windows Built-ins.Name: Microsoft Widgets
Windows Built-ins.Description: News, weather, and information widgets panel.

Windows Built-ins.Name: Microsoft Copilot
Windows Built-ins.Description: AI assistant integrated into Windows. SECURITY FOCUS: Comprehensive removal includes AppX package uninstall + aggressive privacy settings to stop data collection and network activity.
Windows Built-ins.Warning: PRIVACY: This applies security-focused settings including disabling telemetry, search history, and cloud integrations. Some Windows functionality may be affected.
Windows Built-ins.TechnicalNote: Complete approach: 1) Removes AppX package 2) Disables via Group Policy 3) Blocks telemetry 4) Disables cloud search 5) Stops activity tracking. More comprehensive than standard 'disable' methods.

Windows Built-ins.Name: Skype App
Windows Built-ins.Description: Universal Windows Platform version of Skype (consumer version).

Entertainment & Gaming.Name: Xbox Gaming App
Entertainment & Gaming.Description: Xbox Game Pass and gaming services application.

Entertainment & Gaming.Name: Xbox Game Bar
Entertainment & Gaming.Description: In-game overlay for screenshots and recording.

Entertainment & Gaming.Name: Xbox Gaming Overlay
Entertainment & Gaming.Description: Gaming performance overlay and capture tools.

Entertainment & Gaming.Name: Xbox Identity Provider
Entertainment & Gaming.Warning: Note: May affect Xbox Live features. Microsoft Store typically unaffected.

Entertainment & Gaming.Name: Xbox Speech to Text
Entertainment & Gaming.Warning: Note: Difficult to reinstall. Only needed for Xbox voice commands.

Entertainment & Gaming.Name: Xbox TCUI
Entertainment & Gaming.Warning: CRITICAL: Removing will break Microsoft Store, Photos app, and other UWP applications.

Entertainment & Gaming.Name: Movies & TV
Entertainment & Gaming.Description: Video player and Microsoft Store movie purchases.

Entertainment & Gaming.Name: Solitaire Collection
Entertainment & Gaming.Description: Collection of card games with ads.

Third-Party Apps.Description: Sequel to Candy Crush Saga game.

Third-Party Apps.Description: Universal Windows Platform version of Spotify.

Third-Party Apps.Description: Social media application (legacy Twitter package, may be outdated).

Third-Party Apps.Name: Roblox
Third-Party Apps.Description: Online gaming platform popular with children.

Third-Party Apps.Name: Flipboard
Third-Party Apps.Description: News aggregation and magazine-style reading app.

Legacy Browsers.Name: Internet Explorer 11
Legacy Browsers.Description: Disable Internet Explorer while preserving IE Mode in Microsoft Edge.
Legacy Browsers.Warning: CAUTION: May break legacy applications and IE Mode in Microsoft Edge. Only disable if you don't need IE compatibility.
